alert.note: Alert for Beaver Island and surrounding islands; Cheboygan; Emmet; Mackinac Island, Bois Blanc Island (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued December 22 at 3:16PM EST until December 24 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Gaylord
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 7 PM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions expected. Total snow accumulations of one to two feet are possible through Saturday evening. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Emmet and Cheboygan Counties, and Mackinac Island/Bois Blanc Island and Beaver Island and surrounding islands. * WHEN...From 7 PM this evening to 7 PM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be very difficult to impossible early Friday morning through Saturday. Blowing and drifting snow will result in white-out conditions and snow-covered roads. North-south roads will be especially impacted by crosswinds and heavy drifting. The hazardous conditions will impact holiday commuters. Strong winds with snow-covered trees can bring down branches and cause power outages.
info.instruction: Travel should be restricted to emergencies only. If you must travel, have a winter survival kit with you. If you get stranded, stay with your vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Beaver Island and surrounding islands; Cheboygan; Emmet; Mackinac Island, Bois Blanc Island
